dd.p: There is no explicit markup for the body component in MDITA

fig.title: XDITA example
fig.p: The following example demonstrates the use of body in an XDITA topic.
fig.pre: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE topic PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD LIGHTWEIGHT DITA Topic//EN" "lw-topic.dtd"> <topic id="franchise-intro"> <title>An innovative, attractive, and out of the ordinary concept</title> <shortdesc>Are you interested in investing with us? Welcome to our franchise information package.</shortdesc> </topic>

fig.title: HDITA example
fig.p: The following example demonstrates the use of body in an HDITA topic.
fig.pre:
An innovative, attractive, and out of the ordinary concept

Are you interested in investing with us? Welcome to our franchise information package.

fig.title: MDITA example
fig.p: The following example demonstrates the equivalent of the body component in an MDITA topic.
fig.pre:
# An innovative, attractive, and out of the ordinary concept
Are you interested in investing with us? Welcome to our franchise information package.
